docstring:
"""
Functions for reversing a regular expression (used in reverse URL resolving).
Used internally by Django and not intended for external use.

This is not, and is not intended to be, a complete reg-exp decompiler. It
should be good enough for a large class of URLS, however.
"""

classes.docstring: """Represent multiple possibilities at this point in a pattern string."""
classes.name: Choice

classes.docstring: """Represent a capturing group in the pattern string."""
classes.name: Group

classes.docstring: """Represent a non-capturing group in the pattern string."""
classes.name: NonCapture
